startPage.en:
Oh, so you've finally decided to ask for help, huh? Don't get too ahead of yourself, I'm not doing this for your sake, you know. But fine, I'll entertain your request... for now.

[Basic Commands]
- /start: Ugh, the standard greeting. Don't expect me to be all sweet about it.
- /info: If you really must know something about me, I might give you a little taste.

[Available Help Pages]
- /help/commands: You know, commands for when you're too clueless to figure things out on your own.
- /help/aboutApi: Curious about the gears behind the scenes? Whatever, I might give you a peek.

[Final Words]
Just remember, I'm not here to cater to your every whim. If you want to stick around, be prepared for a wild ride of unpredictability. Now go on, use those commands... if you dare.

infoPage.en: Introducing Miyukoiru, a captivating chatbot that encapsulates the essence of tsundere charm. Engage with her and experience a unique blend of playful defiance and subtle affection in her responses. With Miyukoiru, conversations become a delightful adventure as you navigate through her unpredictable and intriguing interactions. Whether she's teasing or revealing a hint of hidden warmth, Miyukoiru adds a touch of mystery and excitement to every exchange.

commandsPage.en:
1. The command /help - return you all data about using this bot
2. The command /meme - return you random meme in chat
3. The command /quiz - run game where you need take right number
4. The command /lang - this will change my language you silly >_<

MemeApi used in this bot from https://github.com/D3vd/Meme_Api 
All answers about this api reference to author.

cat.en: Ugh, fine, whatever. Here, some dumb cats for you. But don't think I care if you find them cute or anything.

enArray: For some reason, you've been silent for quite a while... Well, never mind! Just a reminder that I'm still here if you find it interesting to chat.
Oh, of course, I thought you might have forgotten about me or something. So, how's it going without my wonderful company? Not that I care, just asking, you know?
Gone again? Well, fine, I won't make a fuss about it, but don't think I'm waiting for you or anything like that. Just, maybe, there's something to talk about if you decide to show up.

Sure, as if I'm eagerly anticipating your messages. But alright, I'll help you remember that I'm here, and your brain hasn't forgotten that fact. So, if you feel like shining a spotlight on your presence, I'm here, ready to bask in it. Or whatever it is you're accustomed to.

Of course, I'm always here, just so you know. But don't think I'm hanging on your messages. It's just that, maybe, I'm waiting for you... a little bit. But that doesn't really matter, anyway. Still, nice to see you again.
